main event: A bright oval-shaped object was observed hovering in De Borgia, Montana for 2 to 3 minutes on August 27, 1952.
interesting points: The object displayed bright colors and changed colors as it moved., Witnesses reported it as having a saucer shape., The object hovered silently and appeared to rotate slowly., It was estimated to be about 50 feet in diameter., The sighting was part of multiple reports in the De Borgia area around that time.
witness description: A 41-year-old male with a master's degree, working in a rational profession, who reported the sighting as strange and unexplainable.
